it.unipr.netsec.rawsocket.ethernet

Class RawEthInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.NetInterface
      • it.unipr.netsec.rawsocket.ethernet.RawEthInterface

  • public class RawEthInterface
extends NetInterface
    Ethernet interface for sending or receiving Ethernet packets through one node network card.

    It uses RawLinkSocket for capturing and/sending raw Ethernet packets.
